review: I'm really impressed with this officially licensed 3DS carrying case. It fits my 3DS XL perfectly and keeps it secure during travel, which is a big plus. The hard shell construction provides excellent protection, and the case even holds up to 6 game cards and extra styluses, which is more than enough for my needs. The aesthetic design matches my 3DS, making it look great. The only minor drawback is that it doesn't have room for a charger, but for the price and quality, it's a fantastic value. Highly recommend!
